div.l: For crystis soule and here a nobyl game
For by that lord that callid is saynt Iame
As I haue thryes in thys short nyght
Swyuyd the mylleris doughter bolt vpright
Whylis thou hast as a coward be agaste
Ye false harlot quod the myllar haste
A fals traytour fals clerke quod he
Thou shalt be ded by goddis dygnyte
Who durste be so bolde to dysperage
My doughter that is of suche lynage
And by the throte bolle he caughte aleyn
And he hente hym dispitously agayn
And on the nose he smot hym wyth hys fist
Doun ran the blody streme vp on hys brest
And in the floor wyth nose ⁊ mouth to broke
They walowyd as piggis do in a poke
And vp they goon ⁊ doun ayen anon
Tyl that the Myllere sporned at a stoon
And doun he fyl bacward on hys wyf
That wyst no thyng of thys nyce stryf
For she was falle a slepe a lytyl wyght
With Iohn þe clerk that wakyd had al nyght
And wyth the fal out of her slepe she breyd
Help holy cros of bromehom she sayd
In manus tuas to the lord I calle
Awake symond the feend is on me falle
Myn hert is brokyn helpe I am but ded
There lyeth one on my wombe and on my hed
Help Symkyn for the fals clerkis fighte
Thys Iohn stert vp as faste as he myghte
And graspyd by the wallis to and fro
To fynde a staf and she stert vp also
And knewe þe efters bet than dyd thys Iohn
And by the wal a staf she took anon
And saw a lytyl shymerynge of a light
For at an hole in shoon the mone bryght
And by that lyght she sawe hem bothe two
But sikirly she nyste who was who
